metadata.title: CVE-2024-35831 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:io_uring: Fix release of pinned pages when __io_uaddr_map fails Looking atthe error path of __io_uaddr_map, if we fail after pinning the pages forany reasons, ret will be set to -EINVAL and the error handler won'tproperly release the pinned pages. I didn't manage to trigger it withoutforcing a failure, but it can happen in real life when memory is heavilyfragmented.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
